item.description:
Hello -- Our next meetup will be a discussion of the book "The Best Buddhist Writing 2006" Edited by Melvin McLeod, published by Shambhala Publications. This is a great sampler of writings by some of today's well known Buddhist teachers and other compelling authors, including Sharon Salzberg, Sakyong Mipham Rinpoche, Pema Chodron, Thich Nhat Hanh, The Dalai Lama, Jon Kabat -Zinn, and Roshi Bodhin Kjolhede. This will be a most interesting discussion, so please consider joining us!

Aurore Eaton
Manchester, New Hampshire
item.name: Book Discussion - "The Best Buddhist Writing 2006" Oct. 8
